column4: I'm trying to find a way to backup home directory files from my desktop to a remote local server so that I can sync my laptop to the server every day to keep data conformed between the three machines. Rsync seems a little too much to handle that kind of thing. Is there any other appropriate alternative?
still, rsync is the fastest and easiest way
That was my way of saying I'm getting terribly lost in the man pages for something I wanted to set up quickly.
there's 'lucky backup', a GUI for rsync, there's also grsync
